title: Building sqlx-cli fails - exclusive range pattern syntax is experimental
body:
When running this Dockerfile on my M1 MacBook Pro, the compilation fails:

```
FROM rust:1.76.0-bookworm
RUN cargo install sqlx-cli@0.8.1
```

I'm getting following error message:

```
   Compiling sqlx-mysql v0.8.1
error[E0658]: exclusive range pattern syntax is experimental
  --> /usr/local/cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-6f17d22bba15001f/sqlx-mysql-0.8.1/src/io/buf_mut.rs:19:13
   |
19 |             ..251 => self.push(encoded_le[0]),
   |             ^^^^^
   |
   = note: see issue #37854 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/37854> for more information

error[E0658]: exclusive range pattern syntax is experimental
  --> /usr/local/cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-6f17d22bba15001f/sqlx-mysql-0.8.1/src/io/buf_mut.rs:20:13
   |
20 |             251..0x1_00_00 => {
   |             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = note: see issue #37854 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/37854> for more information

error[E0658]: exclusive range pattern syntax is experimental
  --> /usr/local/cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-6f17d22bba15001f/sqlx-mysql-0.8.1/src/io/buf_mut.rs:24:13
   |
24 |             0x1_00_00..0x1_00_00_00 => {
   |             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |
   = note: see issue #37854 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/37854> for more information
```

| Docker image | SQLx version | result | 
| --- | --- | --- |
| rust:1.76.0-bookworm | sqlx-cli@0.8.1 | Fail | 
| rust:1.76.0-bookworm | sqlx-cli@0.8.0 | Ok | 
| rust:1.79.0-bookworm | sqlx-cli@0.8.1 | Fail | 
| rust:1.80.1-bookworm | sqlx-cli@0.8.1 | Ok | 


### Info
* SQLx version: 0.8.1
* SQLx features enabled: default
* Database server and version: not applicable
* Operating system: OS X Sonoma 14.6.1 on host.
* `rustc --version`: 1.76.0, 1.79.2
* Device: MacBookPro18,1, with Apple M1 Pro chip
